types.name: ArrayDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.ArraySchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to enumerable types.

types.name: ArraySerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.ArraySchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            enumerable types.

types.name: BinaryCodec
types.summary: A binary codec implementation.

types.name: BinaryDeserializerBuilder
types.summary: A deserializer builder configured with a reasonable set of default cases.

types.name: BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary: A base <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinaryDeserializerBuilderCase" /> implementation.

types.name: BinaryDeserializerBuilderContext
types.summary: A base <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinaryDeserializerBuilderContext" /> implementation.

types.name: BinaryDeserializerBuildResult
types.summary: A base <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinaryDeserializerBuildResult" /> implementation.

types.name: BinarySerializerBuilder
types.summary: A serializer builder configured with a reasonable set of default cases.

types.name: BinarySerializerBuilderCase
types.summary: A base <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinarySerializerBuilderCase" /> implementation.

types.name: BinarySerializerBuilderContext
types.summary: A base <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinarySerializerBuilderContext" /> implementation.

types.name: BinarySerializerBuildResult
types.summary: A base <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinarySerializerBuildResult" /> implementation.

types.name: BooleanDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BooleanSchema" /> and attempts to map
            it to any provided type.

types.name: BooleanSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BooleanSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

types.name: BytesDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BytesSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

types.name: BytesSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BytesSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.

types.name: DecimalDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DecimalLogicalType" /> and attempts to
            map it to any provided type.

types.name: DecimalSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DecimalLogicalType" /> and attempts to
            map it to any provided type.

types.name: DoubleDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DoubleSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

types.name: DoubleSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DoubleSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

types.name: DurationDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DurationLogicalType" /> and attempts to
            map it to <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

types.name: DurationSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DurationLogicalType" /> and attempts to
            map it to <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

types.name: EnumDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.EnumSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to enum types.

types.name: EnumSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.EnumSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            enum types.

types.name: FixedDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

types.name: FixedSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.

types.name: FloatDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FloatSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

types.name: FloatSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FloatSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.

types.name: IBinaryCodec
types.summary: Handles reading and writing serialized Avro data.

types.name: IBinaryDeserializer<T>
types.summary: Creates an object from a binary Avro representation.

types.name: IBinaryDeserializerBuilder
types.summary: Builds Avro deserializers for .NET types.

types.name: IBinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
Builds Avro deserializers for specific type-schema combinations. See
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilder" /> for implementation details.

types.name: IBinaryDeserializerBuilderContext
types.summary: An object that contains information to build a top-level deserialization function.

types.name: IBinaryDeserializerBuildResult
types.summary: Represents the outcome of a deserializer builder case.

types.name: IBinarySerializer<T>
types.summary: Creates a binary Avro representation of an object.

types.name: IBinarySerializerBuilder
types.summary: Builds Avro serializers for .NET types.

types.name: IBinarySerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
Builds Avro serializers for specific type-schema combinations. Used by
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilder" /> to break apart serializer building logic.

types.name: IBinarySerializerBuilderContext
types.summary: An object that contains information to build a top-level serialization function.

types.name: IBinarySerializerBuildResult
types.summary: Represents the outcome of a serializer builder case.

types.name: IDeserializer<T>
types.summary: Creates an object from an Avro representation.

types.name: IntegerDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.IntSchema" /> or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.LongSchema" />
            and attempts to map them to any provided type.

types.name: IntegerSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.IntSchema" /> or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.LongSchema" />
            and attempts to map them to any provided type.

types.name: ISerializer<T>
types.summary: Creates an Avro representation of an object.

types.name: MapDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MapSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to dictionary types.

types.name: MapSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MapSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            dictionary types.

types.name: NullDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary: A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.NullSchema" />.

types.name: NullSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary: A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.NullSchema" />.

types.name: RecordDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" /> and attempts to map
            it to classes or structs using property/fields to set values.

types.name: RecordSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" /> and attempts to map
            it to classes or structs.

types.name: StringDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.StringSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

types.name: StringSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.StringSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.

types.name: TimestampDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MicrosecondTimestampLogicalType" />
            or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MillisecondTimestampLogicalType" /> and attempts to map them to
            <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> or <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.

types.name: TimestampSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MicrosecondTimestampLogicalType" />
            or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MillisecondTimestampLogicalType" /> and attempts to map them to
            <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> or <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.

types.name: UnionDeserializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.UnionSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

types.name: UnionSerializerBuilderCase
types.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.UnionSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.
